front.title: Sharing change attribute implementation details with NFSv4 clients

abstract.t: This document describes an extension to the NFSv4 protocol thatallows the server to share information about the implementation ofits change attribute with the client. The aim is to improve theclient's ability to determine the order in which parallel updates tothe same file were processed.KeywordsThe key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT","SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in thisdocument are to be interpreted as described in [RFC2119].
